New Records: Cenk Tosun scored a stoppage-time winner to send Turkey into the knockout stage and eliminate the Czech Republic
Key Match Events: Tomas Chory received a red card after the final whistle
Post-Match Reflections: Czech Republic coach Ivan Hasek expressed disappointment over the loss and the team's inability to score
Turkey's Arda Guler and Czech Republic's Tomas Soucek were booked
Miscellaneous Highlights: Romanian referee Istvan Kovacs showed 18 yellow cards and 1 red card during the match
Others: The match was played in Hamburg, Germany
